basics.name: Zihao Li
basics.summary: Transportation System Modeler at NCTCOG transportation department, the MPO of Dallas Fort-Worth metropolitan area. Experienced in travel demand modeling, machine learning applications in transportation, data analysis and visualization, traffic simulation.
